description: Post-sale customer success and account management with onboarding, health scoring, and success metrics

test_cases.name: Customer Accounts Page Load
test_cases.description: Verify the customer accounts page loads correctly with all components
steps: Navigate to /customer-accounts
Verify page title contains 'Customer Accounts'
Verify page description is displayed
Verify customer accounts grid is displayed
Verify loading state is handled properly
Verify error state is handled gracefully
test_cases.expected_result: Page loads with all components visible and functional

expected_elements: .text-gray-600:contains('Manage customer accounts and track success metrics')

test_cases.name: Customer Accounts Display
test_cases.description: Verify customer accounts are displayed with correct information
steps: Navigate to customer accounts page
Verify accounts grid is displayed
Verify each account shows name and deal ID
Verify onboarding status is displayed with proper color coding
Verify health score is shown when available
Verify renewal probability is shown when available
Verify account actions (Metrics, Start Onboarding) are available
test_cases.expected_result: All customer accounts display with complete information

test_cases.name: Account Status Icons and Colors
test_cases.description: Test that account status icons and colors are displayed correctly
steps: Navigate to customer accounts page
Verify status icons are displayed for each account
Verify completed status shows green checkmark
Verify in_progress status shows yellow clock
Verify pending status shows gray alert circle
Verify status colors match the status type
Verify status text is readable and properly formatted
test_cases.expected_result: Status icons and colors are displayed correctly for all accounts

test_cases.name: Health Score Display
test_cases.description: Test that health scores are displayed with proper color coding
steps: Navigate to customer accounts page
Verify health scores are displayed when available
Verify high health scores (≥80) show green color
Verify medium health scores (60-79) show yellow color
Verify low health scores (<60) show red color
Verify health score percentage is displayed correctly
Verify health score icon (TrendingUp) is shown
test_cases.expected_result: Health scores are displayed with appropriate color coding

test_cases.name: Renewal Probability Display
test_cases.description: Test that renewal probabilities are displayed correctly
steps: Navigate to customer accounts page
Verify renewal probabilities are displayed when available
Verify renewal probability percentage is shown
Verify renewal probability icon (BarChart3) is displayed
Verify renewal probability is color-coded green
Verify renewal probability is properly formatted
test_cases.expected_result: Renewal probabilities are displayed correctly with proper formatting

test_cases.name: Success Metrics Modal
test_cases.description: Test viewing customer success metrics in modal
steps: Navigate to customer accounts page
Click 'Metrics' button on an account
Verify success metrics modal opens
Verify modal title is 'Customer Success Metrics'
Verify health score is displayed prominently
Verify renewal probability is displayed prominently
Verify key metrics section shows all required data
Verify engagement section shows level and last activity
Verify close button works correctly
test_cases.expected_result: Success metrics modal displays all required information correctly

test_cases.name: Start Onboarding Process
test_cases.description: Test starting the onboarding process for an account
steps: Navigate to customer accounts page
Find an account with 'pending' onboarding status
Click 'Start Onboarding' button
Verify onboarding success modal opens
Verify modal shows 'Onboarding Started Successfully!'
Verify onboarding tasks are listed
Verify task details include title, description, due date, and status
Verify 'What happens next?' section is displayed
Verify 'Got it!' button closes the modal
Verify account status updates after onboarding starts
test_cases.expected_result: Onboarding process starts successfully and shows task details

test_cases.name: Onboarding Tasks Display
test_cases.description: Test that onboarding tasks are displayed with proper formatting
steps: Start onboarding process for an account
Verify onboarding tasks are displayed in modal
Verify each task shows task number
Verify task title is displayed prominently
Verify task description is shown
Verify due date is displayed with calendar icon
Verify task status is color-coded
Verify task status badges are properly styled
test_cases.expected_result: Onboarding tasks are displayed with proper formatting and information

test_cases.name: Account Actions Availability
test_cases.description: Test that account actions are available based on account status
steps: Navigate to customer accounts page
Verify 'Metrics' button is available for all accounts
Verify 'Start Onboarding' button is only available for pending accounts
Verify 'Start Onboarding' button is not shown for completed accounts
Verify 'Start Onboarding' button is not shown for in_progress accounts
Verify button styling is consistent and accessible
test_cases.expected_result: Account actions are available based on appropriate account status

test_cases.name: Loading State Handling
test_cases.description: Test that loading states are handled properly
steps: Navigate to customer accounts page
Verify loading spinner is displayed initially
Verify loading spinner is centered on page
Verify loading text is displayed
Verify loading state disappears when data loads
Verify smooth transition from loading to content
test_cases.expected_result: Loading states are handled properly with smooth transitions

test_cases.name: Error State Handling
test_cases.description: Test that error states are handled gracefully
steps: Navigate to customer accounts page
Simulate API failure or network error
Verify error message is displayed
Verify error message is properly styled
Verify error message is informative
Verify page remains functional after error
Verify retry mechanism works if available
test_cases.expected_result: Error states are handled gracefully with proper error display

test_cases.name: Empty State Handling
test_cases.description: Test that empty states are handled when no accounts exist
steps: Navigate to customer accounts page with no accounts
Verify empty state is displayed appropriately
Verify empty state message is informative
Verify empty state styling is consistent
Verify empty state doesn't show action buttons inappropriately
test_cases.expected_result: Empty states are handled appropriately with informative messaging

test_cases.name: Responsive Design
test_cases.description: Verify customer accounts page is responsive on different screen sizes
steps: Navigate to customer accounts page
Test on desktop view (1920x1080)
Verify grid layout is properly displayed
Resize browser to tablet view (768x1024)
Verify layout adapts to 2 columns
Resize browser to mobile view (375x667)
Verify layout adapts to single column
Verify modals adapt to smaller screens
Verify all content is accessible and readable
test_cases.expected_result: Page is responsive and functional on all screen sizes

test_cases.name: Modal Interactions
test_cases.description: Test that modal interactions work correctly
steps: Navigate to customer accounts page
Open success metrics modal
Verify modal backdrop is displayed
Verify clicking backdrop doesn't close modal
Verify close button (X) closes modal
Verify modal content is scrollable if needed
Open onboarding modal
Verify modal animations work smoothly
Verify modal z-index is correct
test_cases.expected_result: Modal interactions work correctly with proper behavior

test_cases.name: Data Refresh and Updates
test_cases.description: Test that data refreshes and updates correctly
steps: Navigate to customer accounts page
Start onboarding for an account
Verify account list refreshes after onboarding starts
Verify account status updates in the list
Verify success metrics data is current
Verify onboarding tasks reflect latest status
Verify no stale data is displayed
test_cases.expected_result: Data refreshes and updates correctly after actions
